did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Documents concerning the arrest of shirtless women in Rochester, NY, 1989-1992.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Seven legal documents regarding the defense of ten women in Rochester, NY arrested in 1989 for not wearing shirts in public.

bioghist.head: HISTORY
bioghist.p: On June 24, 1989, ten women picnicking at Durand Eastman Beach, a public park within the City of Rochester, NY, were arrested for violation of Section 245.01 of the New York State Penal Law which threatens women, but not men, with criminal sanctions for revealing their breasts below the top of the areola in a public space. The women asserted their rights to topfree equality.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Seven legal documents regarding the defense of ten women in Rochester, NY arrested in 1989 for not wearing shirts in public.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Documents concerning the arrest of shirtless women in Rochester, NY, #7756. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
